eventie - event binding helper

Makes dealing with events in IE8 bearable. Supported by IE8+ and good browsers.

``` js var elem = document.querySelector('#my-elem'); function onElemClick( event ) { console.log( event.type + ' just happened on #' + event.target.id ); // -> click just happened on #my-elem }

eventie.bind( elem, 'click', onElemClick );

eventie.unbind( elem, 'click', onElemClick ); ```

Bower

eventie is a Bower component.

bash bower install desandro/eventie

Component

component can also be installed via component.

bash component install desandro/eventie

IE 8

eventie add support for event.target and .handleEvent method for Internet Explorer 8.

MIT license

eventie is released under the MIT license.
